messages.subject: Commercial message
messages.msgSnippet: Hi guys, I have listed some tsuka and other items for sale on ebay, they end tonight.  If interested please have a look. regards, Louis
messages.messageBody:

regards,

Louis

messages.subject: Commercial message
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings to all, I just added a Shin Shinto Katana by Koyama Munetoshi and Shinto Katana by Harima Daijo Fujiwara Shigetaka to the web site. Please have a
messages.messageBody:
Greetings to all,
I just added a Shin Shinto Katana by Koyama Munetoshi and Shinto Katana
by Harima Daijo Fujiwara Shigetaka to the web site. Please have a look
if you are so inclined. Thanks

http://www.nihontocraft.com/japanese_sword_home.html

Best regards,
Danny Massey
www.nihontocraft.com

messages.subject: Commercial message
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings to all, I have just added a long gendai katana by Kanetani Katsumasa to my web site. Also, the price on the NTHK papered Owari tsuba has been
messages.messageBody:
Greetings to all,

I have just added a long gendai katana by Kanetani Katsumasa to my web site.
Also, the price on the NTHK papered Owari tsuba has been drastically reduced
and a NTHK papered Shoami tsuba has been listed on eBay. Please take a look if
you have any interest.

http://www.nihontocraft.com/japanese_sword_home.html

Best regards,
Danny Massey
www.nihontocraft.com

messages.subject: Commercial message
messages.msgSnippet: Nihontocraft.com updates Greetings all, I have just added the following items to my website: An article by Kokubo Ten Rules of Tsuba Collecting A katana by
messages.messageBody:
Nihontocraft.com updates

Greetings all,

I have just added the following items to my website:

An article by Kokubo "Ten Rules of Tsuba Collecting"
A katana by Yamashiro no Daijo Kunitsugu
Seven tsuba added to the tosogu page
Four rare tsuba and fittings books

Please take a look if you are interested

www.nihontocraft.com

Best regards,
Danny Massey

messages.subject: Commercial message
messages.msgSnippet: Good day to every one, I put some of my tsubas for sale or trade on my web site (http://www.maximom.com.ar/index_archivos/Tsubas.htm) maybe some one has a
messages.messageBody:
Good day to every one, I put some of my tsubas for sale or trade on my web
site (http://www.maximom.com.ar/index_archivos/Tsubas.htm) maybe some one
has a cheap blade that is suitable to hobby polishing, or gendaito, or a
gunto, or same, or tsukaito, or polishing stones.
Thank you for the bandwidth.
MÃ¡ximo

messages.subject: Commercial message
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings everyone, I just added some new items to the sales section of my web site. They are as follows : A fine calligraphy by Yamaoka Tesshu An Edo period
messages.messageBody:
Greetings everyone,

I just added some new items to the sales section of my web site. They are as follows :

A fine calligraphy by Yamaoka Tesshu

An Edo period wakizashi zutsu ( sword case )

Nagamitsu Gendai katana

Bizen Naganori koto wakizashi


Please take a look if you are so inclined www.nihontocraft.com

Thanks,
Danny Massey

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
